title: Customize reCAPTCHA script loading
description: By default vue-recaptcha will use unhead to load the reCAPTCHA script.

children.value: If you need to completely control how to load the reCAPTCHA script. You can use
to create a plugin with your own
// This function will be called by useRecaptchaProvider
// You can use any way to load the reCAPTCHA script
// You must pass these two value as query string to reCAPTCHA
// Below you can customize as you want
* you can use recaptcha.net instead of google.com, if you set recaptchaApiURL, this option will be ignored
* you can use your own recaptcha api url, if you set this option, useRecaptchaNet will be ignored
*  Helper function for define your own loadScript function

title: Vee Validation
description: Vee Validate is a plugin for form validation.

children.value: is a plugin for form validation.
Confirm user has clicked the checkbox before submit
Execute challenge when user submit form

links.text: Confirm user has clicked the checkbox before submit
